channel.title: Projects on IntellyGo
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on IntellyGo

item.title: HR4U - Human Resource Management System
item.description:
HR4U - Human Resource Management System

A comprehensive Human Resource Management System built to streamline workforce management, attendance tracking, payroll processing, and employee lifecycle management.

Key Features

  • Employee Management: Complete employee lifecycle from onboarding to exit
  • Attendance Tracking: Real-time attendance monitoring with biometric integration
  • Leave Management: Automated leave application and approval workflow
  • Payroll Processing: Automated salary calculation with tax and deduction management
  • Performance Reviews: Structured performance evaluation system
  • Reports & Analytics: Comprehensive HR reports and dashboards

Technologies Used

  • Backend: PHP Laravel
  • Frontend: Vue.js, Alpine.js
  • Database: MySQL
  • API: RESTful API architecture

Outcome

Successfully deployed across multiple organizations, managing 1000+ employees with improved HR efficiency by 60%.

item.title: CBL - City Bank Limited Portal
item.description:
CBL - City Bank Limited Portal

An enterprise-grade banking portal designed for City Bank Limited, providing secure transaction management, account services, and customer relationship management.

Key Features

  • Account Management: Comprehensive account overview and management
  • Transaction Processing: Real-time transaction handling with security protocols
  • Customer Portal: Self-service portal for banking customers
  • Reporting Dashboard: Advanced analytics and reporting for bank operations
  • Security: Multi-factor authentication and encryption standards

Technologies Used

  • Backend: PHP Laravel
  • Frontend: React.js
  • Database: PostgreSQL
  • Security: OAuth 2.0, JWT authentication

Outcome

Enhanced customer experience with 24/7 banking services and reduced branch dependency by 45%.

item.title: IDCOL - Infrastructure Development Company
item.description:
IDCOL - Infrastructure Development Company Portal

A robust project management and financing platform for Infrastructure Development Company Limited (IDCOL), managing renewable energy and infrastructure projects.

Key Features

  • Project Tracking: End-to-end project lifecycle management
  • Financial Management: Loan disbursement and tracking system
  • Document Management: Centralized document repository with version control
  • Stakeholder Portal: Multi-level access for different stakeholders
  • Reporting System: Automated project and financial reports

Technologies Used

  • Backend: PHP Laravel
  • Frontend: Vue.js
  • Database: MySQL
  • Storage: AWS S3 for document management

Outcome

Streamlined project management for 200+ renewable energy projects with improved tracking efficiency.

item.title: JBL - Jamuna Bank Limited System
item.description:
JBL - Jamuna Bank Limited System

A comprehensive core banking system developed for Jamuna Bank Limited, integrating various banking services and financial operations.

Key Features

  • Core Banking Operations: Account management, deposits, withdrawals
  • Loan Management: Credit processing and loan tracking system
  • Inter-branch Transactions: Seamless branch-to-branch operations
  • Compliance Module: Regulatory compliance and reporting
  • Mobile Banking Integration: API integration with mobile banking app

Technologies Used

  • Backend: PHP Laravel, Golang (microservices)
  • Frontend: Alpine.js, Tailwind CSS
  • Database: MySQL with replication
  • API: RESTful and GraphQL APIs

Outcome

Modernized banking operations serving 500,000+ customers with 99.9% uptime and improved transaction speed by 70%.

item.title: FSD - Facility Service Desk
item.description:
FSD - Facility Service Desk

A comprehensive Facility Service Desk system designed to streamline facility management operations, maintenance requests, and service delivery across multiple locations.

Key Features

  • Service Request Management: Centralized system for submitting and tracking facility service requests
  • Work Order System: Automated work order generation and assignment to technicians
  • Asset Management: Complete tracking of facility assets, equipment, and inventory
  • Preventive Maintenance: Scheduled maintenance planning and execution
  • Vendor Management: Vendor registration, performance tracking, and contract management
  • Real-time Dashboard: Live monitoring of service requests, work orders, and team performance
  • Mobile Access: Technicians can access and update work orders from mobile devices
  • Reporting & Analytics: Comprehensive reports on facility operations and service metrics

Technologies Used

  • Backend: PHP Laravel
  • Frontend: Vue.js, Bootstrap
  • Database: MySQL
  • API: RESTful API architecture
  • Mobile: Progressive Web App (PWA)

Modules

  1. Service Request Module
